00019 namespace media {
00020 class MetadataProxy;
00021 
00037 GAIA_LOCAL class Metadata {
00038   public:
00039     // The metadata are keyed using integers rather than more heavy
00040     // weight strings. We considered using Bundle to ship the metadata
00041     // between the native layer and the framework layer but dropped that
00042     // option since keeping in sync a native implementation of Bundle
00043     // and the framework one would be too burdensome. Besides Bundle uses
00044     // String for its keys.
00045     // The key range [0 8192) is reserved for the system.
00046     //
00047     // We manually serialize the data in Parcels. For large memory
00048     // blob (bitmaps, raw pictures) we use MemoryFile which allow the
00049     // client to make the data purge-able once it is done with it.
00050     //
00051 
00055     enum MetadataId {
00056         // Indicate whether the media can be paused
00057         PAUSE_AVAILABLE         = 1,  // Boolean
00058         // Indicate whether the media can be backward seeked
00059         SEEK_BACKWARD_AVAILABLE = 2,  // Boolean
00060         // Indicate whether the media can be forward seeked
00061         SEEK_FORWARD_AVAILABLE  = 3,  // Boolean
00062         // Indicate whether the media can be seeked
00063         SEEK_AVAILABLE          = 4,  // Boolean
00064         TITLE                   = 5,  // String
00065         COMMENT                 = 6,  // String
00066         COPYRIGHT               = 7,  // String
00067         ALBUM                   = 8,  // String
00068         ARTIST                  = 9,  // String
00069         AUTHOR                  = 10,  // String
00070         COMPOSER                = 11,  // String
00071         GENRE                   = 12,  // String
00072         DATE                    = 13,  // Date
00073         DURATION                = 14,  // Integer(millisec)
00074         CD_TRACK_NUM            = 15,  // Integer 1-based
00075         CD_TRACK_MAX            = 16,  // Integer
00076         RATING                  = 17,  // String
00077         ALBUM_ART               = 18,  // byte[]
00078         VIDEO_FRAME             = 19,  // Bitmap
00079         BIT_RATE                = 20,  // Integer, Aggregate rate of
00080                                        // all the streams in bps.
00081         AUDIO_BIT_RATE          = 21,  // Integer, bps
00082         VIDEO_BIT_RATE          = 22,  // Integer, bps
00083         AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE       = 23,  // Integer, Hz
00084         VIDEO_FRAME_RATE        = 24,  // Integer, Hz
00085 
00086         // See RFC2046 and RFC4281.
00087         MIME_TYPE               = 25,  // String
00088         AUDIO_CODEC             = 26,  // String
00089         VIDEO_CODEC             = 27,  // String
00090         VIDEO_HEIGHT            = 28,  // Integer
00091         VIDEO_WIDTH             = 29,  // Integer
00092         NUM_TRACKS              = 30,  // Integer
00093         DRM_CRIPPLED            = 31,  // Boolean
00094         LAST_SYSTEM             = 31,
00095         FIRST_CUSTOM            = 8192
00096     };
00097 
00098     enum Vals {
00099         ANY            = 0,  // Never used for metadata returned, only for filtering. Keep in sync with kAny in MediaPlayerService.cpp
00100         STRING_VAL     = 1,
00101         INTEGER_VAL    = 2,
00102         BOOLEAN_VAL    = 3,
00103         LONG_VAL       = 4,
00104         DOUBLE_VAL     = 5,
00105         DATE_VAL       = 6,
00106         BYTE_ARRAY_VAL = 7,
00107         LAST_TYPE      = 7
00108     };
00109 
00113     Metadata();
00114 
00118     virtual ~Metadata();
00119 
00148     bool parse(const gaia::core::Parcel& parcel);
00149 
00153     base::Vector<MetadataId> keySet();
00154 
00158     bool has(MetadataId metadataId);
00159 
00160     // Accessors.
00161     // Caller must make sure the key is present using the {@code has}
00162     // method.
00163 
00167     base::String getString(MetadataId metadataId);
00168 
00172     int32_t getInt(MetadataId metadataId);
00173 
00177     bool getBoolean(MetadataId metadataId);
00178 
00182     int64_t getLong(MetadataId metadataId);
00183 
00187     double getDouble(MetadataId metadataId);
00188 
00192      // TODO: getByteArray()
00193     //base::Vector<byte_t> getByteArray(const MetadataId metadataId);
00194 
00198     locale::Date getDate(MetadataId metadataId);
00199 
00205     static MetadataId lastSytemId();
00206 
00211     static MetadataId firstCustomId();
00212 
00217     static Vals lastType();
00218 
00219   private:
00220     MetadataProxy* mpMetadataProxy;
00221     DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(Metadata);
00222 };  // class Metadata
00224 }  // namespace media
00225 }  // namespace gaia
